Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension® LOCI Free Thyroxine Flex® Reagent Cartridge, FT4L
Dimension® LOCI Thyroid Stimulating Hormone Flex® Reagent Cartridge, TSHL
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension® LOCI FT4L and TSHL reagent cartridges with pediatric reference intervals added to labeling; no changes to reagents or performance.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for quantitative measurement of free thyroxine or thyroid stimulating hormone in human serum and plasma on the Dimension® EXL™ system, for diagnosis and monitoring of thyroid disease, including pediatric reference intervals.
